column5: So our summer temps started yesterday. I've had enough already!!!! Pretty toasty in the sun.    Not so bad otherwise, if you can find shade.
Stand out on the asphault for 30 minutes and you'll really feel toasty!
Stop pulling people over David and you can enjoy the a/c in the cruiser !
You've got it all wrong Wayne. Dave's a lot more likely to get pulled over himself.    (Picture perfect weather bud, enjoy it!)
I was referring to Officer Dave.. not NWT Dave !  .. and about that boat he ripped that poor little lady off for the other day... it's on sale at CTC this week for $999.99 ($300 off!)

Close, but that's a different make and size. I found one made by the company that makes mine in one size smaller on sale for $999 US. I think the value to replace mine is in the $1,200 to $1,500 range.
